title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM or chat backends in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go—browse, chat, manage models without leaving the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VSCode extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring-Boot starters; chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm (juanjosevar/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JS package—weekly downloads and version history.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package with wheels for Linux/macOS/Windows.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot (tekwrk/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot (grantlemons/ollama-slack-bot)
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions with Ollama models privately.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama providing async client and strongly-typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-elixir (bmuller/ollama-elixir)
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer behavior and streaming via WebSockets.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (r2d2roid/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: Streamlit chatbot that performs RAG over uploaded documents using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.
